CustomField.description: This field is a workaround until the partner community is in place and distribution partners can actually be object owners // For go-live not used, since Distribution Programm on hold // Stakeholders: PaM
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Is a distribution Partner owner of this Opportunity? Set on creation or by Leadmanagent // Only used as interim until lookup to Contact is implemented
CustomField.label: Distribution Partner Account
